alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:00AM EST until February 04 at 7:18PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Aughwick Creek At Shirleysburg affecting Huntingdon County. For the Aughwick Creek...including Shirleysburg...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aughwick Creek At Shirleysburg. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Aughwick Creek at Shirleysburg exceeds its banks. Several homes are affected. At 12.0 feet, Flood waters from Aughwick Creek cover portions of Gilbo Road, Aughwick Mills Road and Keystone Road in Shirley Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 10.4 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 730 PM EST.
